text: The Beard Congregational Church, at 402 Granger St. in Erath, Louisiana was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2015. Includes 12 photos from 2015. It is a simple frame country church built in 1916. It also served as a school for African American children. ==References== Category:Schools in Vermilion Parish, Louisiana Category:Congregational churches in Louisiana Category:African-American historic places Category:National Register of Historic Places in Vermilion Parish, Louisiana Category:Churches completed in 1916 Category:Churches on the National Register of Historic Places in Louisiana Category:School buildings completed in 1916 Category:School buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Louisiana
title: Beard Congregational Church
